title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 114 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 114 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: When Israel went out of Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of strange language;
lineList.cn: 以色列出了埃及，雅各家离开说异言之民。

lineList.en: Judah was his sanctuary, and Israel his dominion.
lineList.cn: 那时，犹大为主的圣所，以色列为他所治理的国度。

lineList.en: The sea saw it, and fled: Jordan was driven back.
lineList.cn: 沧海看见就奔逃。约旦河也倒流。

lineList.en: The mountains skipped like rams, and the little hills like lambs.
lineList.cn: 大山踊跃，如公羊。小山跳舞，如羊羔。

lineList.en: What ailed thee, O thou sea, that thou fleddest? thou Jordan, that thou wast driven back?
lineList.cn: 沧海阿，你为何奔逃。约旦哪，你为何倒流。

lineList.en: Ye mountains, that ye skipped like rams; and ye little hills, like lambs?
lineList.cn: 大山哪，你为何踊跃，如公羊。小山哪，你为何跳舞，如羊羔。

lineList.en: Tremble, thou earth, at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the God of Jacob;
lineList.cn: 大地阿，你因见主的面，就是雅各神的面，便要震动。

lineList.en: Which turned the rock into a standing water, the flint into a fountain of waters.
lineList.cn: 他叫磐石变为水池，叫坚石变为泉源。
